mng: variant of 夭[yao1], to die young, to die prematurely, Taiwan pr. [yao3]

exm.mng: to die young or prematurely, to come to a premature end, to be aborted prematurely
to escape without trace (idiom); to make one's getaway (from the scene of a crime), to show a clean pair of heels
to die young, Taiwan pr. [zao3 yao3]
